channel.title: About the Modifications, Additions, Improvements category
channel.description: Inbox for suggestions - post will be moved into appropriate upgrade forums as they are made. For instance, if a proposal would constitute a non-backwardly compatible change to the IATI standard, it would most likely be moved into the nearest Integer upgrade forum.

item.title: About the Modifications, Additions, Improvements category
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
Inbox for suggestions - post will be moved into appropriate upgrade forums as they are made. For instance, if a proposal would constitute a non-backwardly compatible change to the IATI standard, it would most likely be moved into the nearest Integer upgrade forum.
